item.description:
Join the Jaycees for an Introduction to Yoga session at Yoga Born Studios located in Stop n Shop Plaza, 1735 Ellington Road, South Windsor on Thursday, May 17th from 7:30 pm to 8:30 pm (please arrive by 7:15 pm).  The cost is $12.76 per person. 

Jaycee members are reimbursed $5.00 off the price.  Yoga is good for the heart, mind and soul and is a great way to reduce stress and anxiety in our everyday lives in addition to many other benefits such as increased concentration, flexibility, strengthening, better sleep and so on.  

You can obtain more information at the website www.yogaborn.com.
item.name: Jaycee Yoga Session
